---
title: "Part 1 (ch24) Questions Numeric"
---


::: {.callout-important}
**Type your answers with "." instead of ","! For numerical answers, use 2 decimal places. For instance, if your answer is 0.12345 or 12.345%, type, "12.34" in the box.**
:::


## Question 1










You founded your own firm two years ago. Initially, you contributed **0.054 million**  of your money and, in return, received **1 million** shares of stock. Since then, you have sold an additional **0.75 million** shares to angel investors. You are now considering raising even more capital from a venture capitalist. The venture capitalist has agreed to invest **3 million**  and receive **2 million** shares. Assuming that this is the venture capitalist’s first investment in your company. 

**What is the post-money valuation, in million? ** <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='5' data-answer='["5.625"]'/>

**Assuming that this is the venture capitalist’s first investment in your company, what percentage of the firm will he or she end up owning?**  <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='6' data-answer='["53.333"]'/>

**What percentage will you own?**  <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='6' data-answer='["26.667"]'/>

**What is the value of your shares, in million?**  <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='3' data-answer='["1.5"]'/>









**Answers**:


1) 5.625

2) 53.333

3) 26.667

4) 1.5



___



## Question 2









**Q:** A company has raised capital as follows (in millions USD). 

\item Series A Pre-Money: **2.803** & Series A Post-Money: **4.469**

\item Series B Pre-Money: **51.534** & Series B Post-Money: **88.187**

\item Series C Pre-Money: **139.14** & Series C Post-Money: **208.693**

**How much did the company raised in each round, in millions?**

Round A: <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='5' data-answer='["1.666"]'/>, Round B: <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='6' data-answer='["36.653"]'/>, Round C: <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='6' data-answer='["69.553"]'/>



**Assuming no other securities were issued, what fraction of the firm’s shares were held by common shareholders (founders and employees) after each round, in percent?**

Round A: <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='6' data-answer='["62.721"]'/>, Round B: <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='6' data-answer='["36.652"]'/> , Round C: <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='6' data-answer='["24.437"]'/>













**Answers:**

1) 

Round A: 4.469 -  2.803  = 1.666

Round B: 88.187 -  51.534  = 36.653 

Round C: 208.693 -  139.14  =69.553

2) 

Round A: 2.803 /  4.469  = 62.721

Round B: 51.534 /  88.187 *   2.803 /  4.469 = 36.652 

Round C: 139.14 /  208.693 *   2.803 /  4.469 * 51.534 /  88.187 = 24.437



___
